sentences: Uued lapsevanemad vajavad palju abi ja nõuandeid.
Meie uues kodus on palju ruumi.
Uued reeglid kehtivad alates järgmisest kuust.
context: The word 'uued' is the plural form of the Estonian adjective 'uus', which means 'new'. It is used to describe multiple things that are recently made, discovered, or acquired. In context, it often appears in phrases like 'uued reeglid' (new rules), 'uued elamud' (new buildings/homes), or 'uued teadmised' (new knowledge).
